titleInfo.title: Greater Omaha Packing Company, Inc. v. Liberty Mutual Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: INITIAL PROGRESSION ORDER - A telephonic conference with the undersigned magistrate judge will be held on September 18, 2012 at 11:00 a.m. to discuss the status of case progression, any anticipated or filed motions to name additional parties, the current status of the parties settlement discussions, and further case scheduling. Counsel for the plaintiff shall place the call. Mandatory disclosures shall be served by August 23, 2012.Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (GJG)

titleInfo.title: Greater Omaha Packing Company, Inc. v. Liberty Mutual Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting in part and denying in part (39) Motion to Consolidate Cases in case 4:12-cv-03053-CRZ and granting in part and denying in part (31) Motion to Consolidate Cases in case 4:12-cv-03054-WKU-CRZ. Cases are consolidated for discovery and pretrial preparation purposes only. Counsel for the parties shall confer and, on or before October 8, 2012, they shall jointly file a Form 35 (Rule 26 (f)) Report. Member Cases: 4:12-cv-03053-CRZ, 4:12-cv-03054-WKU-CRZ. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (JAB)

titleInfo.title: Greater Omaha Packing Company, Inc. v. Liberty Mutual Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED PROGRESSION ORDER - Liberty Mutual's motions (4:12cv3053, Filing No. 64, and 4:12cv3054, Filing No. 59), are granted. The jury trial of this case is set to commence before Warren K. Urbom, Senior United States District Judge, in Courtroom 4, United States Courthouse, Lincoln, Nebraska, at 9:00 a.m. on October 7, 2013, or as soon thereafter as the case may be called, for a duration of three (3) trial days. A conference with counsel will be held in Judge Urbom's chambers at 8:30 a.m. on the first day of trial. Jury selection will be held at the commencement of trial. The Pretrial Conference is scheduled to be held before the undersigned magistrate judge on September 24, 2013 at 11:00 a.m., and will be conducted by WebEx conferencing. To facilitate this conferencing method, the parties proposed Pretrial Conference Order and Exhibit List(s) must be emailed to zwart@ned.uscourts.gov, in either Word Perfect or Word format, by 5:00 p.m. on September 23, 2013. An email will be sent to counsel of record with the instructions and codes for participating in the pretrial conference by WebEx. The deposition deadline is May 28, 2013. All other provisions of the courts prior progression order, (Filing No. 50), remain in effect. Member Cases: 4:12-cv-03053-WKU-CRZ, 4:12-cv-03054-WKU-CRZOrdered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (GJG)

To facilitate this conferencing method, the parties proposed Pretrial Conference Order and Exhibit List(s) must be emailed to zwart@ned.uscourts.gov, in either Word Perfect or Word format, by 5:00 p.m. on September 23, 2013. titleInfo.title: Greater Omaha Packing Company, Inc. v. Liberty Mutual Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting (64) Motion to Amend in case 4:12-cv-03053-WKU-CRZ; granting (59) Motion to Amend in case 4:12-cv-03054-WKU-CRZ. Deposition deadline is May 28, 1013. Deadline for filing motions to dismiss and motions for summary judgment is June 7, 2013. The jury trial is set to commence before Warren K. Urbom, Senior United States District Judge, in Courtroom 4, United State Courthouse, Lincoln, Nebraska at 9:00 a.m. on October 7, 2013, for a duration of three (3) days. An in-chambers conference will be held before Judge Urbom at 8:30 a.m. on October 7, 2013. The Pretrial Conference is scheduled before Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart on September 24, 2013 at 11:00 a.m. by WebEx. An email will be sent to counsel of record with the instructions and codes for participating in the pretrial conference by WebEx. Member Cases: 4:12-cv-03053-WKU-CRZ, 4:12-cv-03054-WKU-CRZOrdered by Magistrate Judge Cheryl R. Zwart. (DMS)
